name: IT 201008 Project4
description: Click and paint! Left click and hold to draw a stream of objects.  Adjust the size of your objects by clicking and dragging the slider. To change colors, open the dropdown menu and select your color of choice. To change shape, open the dropdown menu and select your shape of choice. Press the change rotation button to set your shapes to a random angle. If you would like to paint in silence, check the 'Mute Music' box in the top left corner. To paint a special custom object, right click and drag. This special object has its own custom shape, size, and colors, but has some fun animated effects! Press the spacebar to switch between a bouncing and color changing animation. The game menu will disappear when you right click, but don't worry! Simply left click to bring back the menu.
